name: Astro4Dev Workshop - LARIM 2016
tagline: Astronomy for Development Workshop at LARIM2016
body:
## Rationale

The [Andean Regional Office of Astronomy for Development (ROAD)](http://andean.astro4dev.org/) was formally created in October 2016. Its main mission is to collaborate with the [Office of Astronomy for Development](http://www.astro4dev.org/) to help further the use of astronomy as a tool for development by mobilizing the human and financial resources necessary in order to realize the field’s scientific, technological and cultural benefits to society.

The [Andean ROAD](http://andean.astro4dev.org/) gathers 20+ institutions in Bolivia, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru and Venezuela. Its coordinators are hosted at three collaborating institutions: Universidad de Los Andes (Colombia), Parque Explora-Planetario de Medellín (Colombia), and Sociedad Chilena de Astronomía (Chile)

In this workshop at LARIM2016 we want to:

* Present the current activities of the OAD and the Andean ROAD.
* Introduce the operational principles that will guide the OAD and the Andean ROAD in coming years to create impact.
* Invite the LARIM community to join forces with the OAD and Andean ROAD.
